= qjobs =

== Format ==
cg qjobs ?options?

== Summary ==
returns the running jobs on the cluster in [[tsv]] format.

== Description ==
Convenience function to easily get information on jobs running on a (grid engine) cluster
in a parsable format

== Arguments ==
; **cmd** ...: command (and parameters) to be executed

== Options ==
; -s 0/1: return a summary of running jobs
; -u user: list jobs of the given user


== Category ==
Dev
